short_summary: NOTICE OF PROPOSED PROCUREMENTThe Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below. The delivery is requested at CFB Esquimalt and CFB Halifax.Item 1, GSIN: 2040, NSN: 21-910-6964, Cover, BoatPart No.: C-C-50525, NCAGE: 38915Quantity: 10, Unit of Issue: EA, to be delivered to CFB Halifax.Item 2, GSIN: 2040, NSN: 21-910-6964, Cover, BoatPart No.: C-C-50525, NCAGE: 38915Quantity: 6, Unit of Issue: EA, to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt.
